item.title: Creative coding
item.description: Creative coding Introduction My research imperatives run along the threads of transmediation, intersemiotic translation, post-disciplinarity (interdisciplinarity, multidiscplinarity) and the general concerns of Human Computer Interaction (HCI). I found that by using symbolism and metaphors I can tell a story in my own way. The manipulation of the semiotic process, both in image and music, is crucial for the formal structure of my works and my process of translation. A large part of my contemporary practices in creating audiovisual materials is through creative coding.
